title: Descending Chaos - Haunted Souls (2014)
description:
Descending Chaos- Haunted Souls

Release Year: 2014

Country: Sweden

Format: Mp3 (285 kb/s)


Complete with album cover and booklet.



Tracklisting:

1. The One Within
2. Within Dead I
3. Soulless
4. The Sum (Dead Hand)
5. So Far Away
6. War Chant
7. Past My Prime
8. No Resistance
9. Breathe
10. Enola Gay
11. Smudge



Descending Chaos is a band from Gothenburg with a lot of ambition and the 

power of will. With a non- political, but socially critical view they decided to 

change the Gothenburg-sound metal, they don't take the genre one step 

further; they take a step to the side and step it up.


The band was formed in January 2012 by Peter and Sebastian and since then 

have released one single and started working on the first album. They spent 

the summer of 2013 rehearsing and after a too expensive pre-production and 

a lot of sleepless nights it all seemed to be ready for the studio. During 

October the recording started in Rogue Music and Nacksving Studios with
